description:
The SR Allroad saddle is designed for both road and dirt riding, offering a comfortable and dynamic experience. With CORE HD® technology, it absorbs shocks, reduces numbness, and minimizes pressure, ensuring a smoother ride on any terrain.

  • Ergonomic design reduces pressure on sensitive areas and is the result of extensive testing, prototyping and science (X-rays and CT scans)
  • BASF's Infinergy® transforms road bike shock absorption, while Ergon's CORE HD® technology swiftly recovers its shape, trusted by global running shoe leaders
  • OrthoCell® foam is specifically designed for supporting joints, making it durable and comfortable for long rides
  • The ergonomic core filters out ground vibrations and bumps across the entire seat surface while riding
  • Designed for sit bones that are 12-16cm apart
  • Maximum load 100kg (220lbs)
name: Ergon SR Allroad Core Pro Saddle - Unisex
